summary: Fixes the odd issue where taking some objects from Pinewatch constituted stealing, whereas taking other objects did not.
descriptionHtml:
For some reason, taking items from the first floor of Pinewatch counts as stealing, even though it doesn't in the rest of the dungeon. In the CK, ownership is marked for one of the bandits, so I removed it, making anything inside the bandit lair up for grabs!

If I've missed anything, let me know -- for some reason, the CK doesn't allow for editing of the ownership of an entire cell, so I had to go through and modify every single object by hand.
Every.
Single.
One.
author: persephonecharming
